question: Who inaugurated the National Centre for Clean Coal Research and Development (NCCCR&D) at Indian Institute of Science (IISc)-Bengaluru on September 16, 2019?
explanation: Dr Harsh Vardhan inaugurated the National Centre for Clean Coal Research and Development (NCCCR&D) at Indian Institute of Science (IISc)-Bengaluru on September 16, 2019. NCCCR&D is a national consortium on clean coal research and development led by the Indian Institute of Science with IIT- Kharagpur, Madras, Guwahati, Bombay, and Hyderabad as partners.
